attributes.action: Make Property Sellers Disclose Full House Info Before Listing
attributes.additional_details:
We’re Asking For
A Property Information Dossier (PID) for every home listed.

Paid for by seller  
Includes survey results, structure, energy rating, risks, planning, tenure, defects  

Available when listed  

Scotland has a Single Survey system.

It’s public, reusable, and makes buying far more transparent.

Saves buyers money and stress  
Cuts failed sales/wasted surveys  
Promotes honesty/transparency  
Makes the market fairer/efficient  

You wouldn’t buy a car without knowing the details
attributes.background:
Buying a home shouldn’t be a gamble. 

Right now, buyers must pay hundreds for surveys—only to discover hidden problems after making offers.
 We want sellers to provide a full, professional property report before listing, so buyers know exactly what they’re getting.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a very similar action: "Require sellers to complete surveys & probate before marketing their property". 

Link to the petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/736478
